topic.title: Something from nothing
topic.text:
Not entirely sure, but the Stephen Hawking quote might be referring to the following facts:

  • At the quantum level, something can and does come from nothing all of the time.
  • Some cosmologists claim that the net energy of the universe is zero (negative energy of gravity perfectly balances the positive energy of everything else)
  • Therefore, it's possible that our universe started from nothing and grew to its current size while maintaining the balance between increasing matter and positive energy with increasing gravity.
